title: What Rain Drops Actually Look Like
description:
Head to https://complexlycalendars.com/products/scishow to buy your 2023 SciShow calendar today!

That fabled tear-shaped raindrop may make for a good color-by-numbers, but the truth is that raindrops are a lot more complicated and far less pointy.

Hosted by: Michael Aranda

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow
